ygData.subject: RE: My remaining big questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: I played in beta (from beta 2) and from what I understand, tinkering was completely non-functional.  I don t believe toolkits were even available. I d even
ygData.messageBody:
I played in beta (from beta 2) and from what I understand, tinkering was
completely non-functional. I don't believe toolkits were even available.

I'd even venture that I think tinkering is the last of the trade skills to
get implemented, with perhaps the exception of poison creation (and maybe
tied with alchemy).

-----Original Message-----
From: igbot@...
5. Anyone do tinkering when EQ was beta? Any formulas for robots and such?
I know they were taken out, but maybe such recipes would give clues.
